mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.year AS "year", a.score AS "score", a.level AS "level", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user_performance( id, user_id, year, score, level, remark, create_date, create_by, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{year}, #{score}, #{level}, #{remark}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user_performance SET user_id = #{user.id}, year = #{year}, score = #{score}, level = #{level}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
